meta.title: Diego Bonavida
meta.description: Hey, I'm Diego and I'm a frontend developer. I've built this small place just so I can post about things I find interesting and some other discoveries I make.

posts.title: Let's cache data in Next.js
posts.description: Do you need to cache data in build time in Next.js but you don't know how to? Come here, follow me.

posts.title: How to post articles in other languages in your Next.js Markdown blog
posts.description: How to post articles in other languages in your Next.js Markdown blog
